targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."l4_client.avg_total_rtt" WHERE ("avicontroller" =~ /^$device$/ AND "environment" =~ /^$environment$/ AND "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "vs_name" =~ /^$vs$/ AND "metric_type" = 'virtualservice_metrics') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."l4_server.avg_total_rtt" WHERE ("avicontroller" =~ /^$device$/ AND "environment" =~ /^$environment$/ AND "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "vs_name" =~ /^$vs$/ AND "metric_type" = 'virtualservice_metrics') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "environment" WHERE location =~ /$location/
list.name: environment
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "environment" WHERE location =~ /$location/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "avicontroller" WHERE location =~ /$location/ AND environment =~ /$environment/
list.name: device
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "avicontroller" WHERE location =~ /$location/ AND environment =~ /$environment/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "vs_name" WHERE location =~ /$location/ AND environment =~ /$environment/ AND avicontroller =~ /$device/
list.name: vs
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "vs_name" WHERE location =~ /$location/ AND environment =~ /$environment/ AND avicontroller =~ /$device/
